channel.title: missing objects and floating heads and hands
channel.description:
so i just installed bms, yes the folder name and placement are correct.
the tram part started up fine, i started moving around in the tram. then all of a sudden all of the tram except the door dissapear and go invisble. and now when i see np'cs they are just floating heads and hands with the rest of the body gone'
using A10 5800K amd APU with 12.10 catalyst drivers windows 7 ultimate 64 bit latest direct x

item.title: missing objects and floating heads and hands
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
it could be something in the catalyst 3d settings like catalyst AI, or it could even be due to some option for antialiasing

did you try loading the next chapter? maybe it is only the tram levels that are bugged out

Read full topic
